# <a name="cc0-10-universal"></a><span data-ttu-id="564b2-801">CC0 1.0 通用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="564b2-801">CC0 1.0 Universal</span></span>

## <a name="statement-of-purpose"></a><span data-ttu-id="564b2-802">目的声明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="564b2-802">Statement of Purpose</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="564b2-803">世界上大多数管辖机构的法律自动授予创建者和后续所有者 () ) 以下定义的专属版权和相关权利 ()  (以及创作和 (/或数据库) 作品的原始作品的"所有者") ，即"工作") 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="564b2-803">The laws of most jurisdictions throughout the world automatically confer exclusive Copyright and Related Rights (defined below) upon the creator and subsequent owner(s) (each and all, an “owner”) of an original work of authorship and/or a database (each, a “Work”).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="564b2-804">某些所有者希望永久放弃对作品的这些权利，以便为公众能够可靠地参与创意、文化与科学作品 ("公共") 而不必担心以后的侵犯索赔是基于、修改、合并在其他作品中、以任何形式任意目的（包括但不限于商业目的）重复使用和重新分发。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="564b2-804">Certain owners wish to permanently relinquish those rights to a Work for the purpose of contributing to a commons of creative, cultural and scientific works (“Commons”) that the public can reliably and without fear of later claims of infringement build upon, modify, incorporate in other works, reuse and redistribute as freely as possible in any form whatsoever and for any purposes, including without limitation commercial purposes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="564b2-805">这些所有者可能会为共同之处做贡献，以推广自由文化的理想，进一步产生创意、文化与科学工作，或者通过其他人的使用和努力部分获得工作的信誉或更高价值。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="564b2-805">These owners may contribute to the Commons to promote the ideal of a free culture and the further production of creative, cultural and scientific works, or to gain reputation or greater distribution for their Work in part through the use and efforts of others.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="564b2-2645">定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="564b2-2645">Definitions.</span></span>

   <span data-ttu-id="564b2-2646">"许可"是指本文档第 1 节至 9 节定义的使用、复制和分发的条款和条件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="564b2-2646">"License" shall mean the terms and conditions for use, reproduction, and distribution as defined by Sections 1 through 9 of this document.</span></span>
